setAudioExpression

public void setAudioExpression(java.lang.Boolean setOrNot)
                        throws com.aldebaran.qimessaging.CallError,
                               java.lang.InterruptedException
Enables or disables the playing of sounds indicating the state of the recognition engine. If this option is enabled, a sound is played at the beginning of the recognition process (after a call to the subscribe method), and a sound is played when the user call the unsubscribe method

Parameters:
setOrNot - Enable (true) or disable it (false).
Throws:
com.aldebaran.qimessaging.CallError
java.lang.InterruptedException

pause

public void pause(java.lang.Boolean pause)
           throws com.aldebaran.qimessaging.CallError,
                  java.lang.InterruptedException
Stops and restarts the speech recognition engine according to the input parameter This can be used to add contexts, activate or deactivate rules of a contex, add a words to a slot.

Parameters:
pause - Boolean to enable or disable pause of the speech recognition engine.

setParameter

public void setParameter(java.lang.String paramName,
                         java.lang.Float paramValue)
                  throws com.aldebaran.qimessaging.CallError,
                         java.lang.InterruptedException
Sets a parameter of the speech recognition engine. Note that when the ASR engine language is set to Chinese, no parameter can be set. The parameters that can be set and the corresponding values are: "Sensitivity" - Values : range is [0.0; 1.0]. "Timeout" - Values : default values 3000 ms. Timeout for the remote recognition "MinimumTrailingSilence" : Values : 0 (no) or 1 (yes) - Applies a High-Pass filter on the input signal - default value is 0.

Parameters:
paramName - Name of the parameter.
paramValue - Value of the parameter.
Throws:
com.aldebaran.qimessaging.CallError
java.lang.InterruptedException

_enableRealTimeThread

public void _enableRealTimeThread(java.lang.Boolean isRealTime)
                           throws com.aldebaran.qimessaging.CallError,
                                  java.lang.InterruptedException
Set the ASR_Recognizer thread to real time priority. Be careful this could change the scheduling of the robot.

Parameters:
isRealTime - True or False to enable or disable real time priority.
Throws:
com.aldebaran.qimessaging.CallError
java.lang.InterruptedException

setParameter

public void setParameter(java.lang.String paramName,
                         java.lang.Boolean paramValue)
                  throws com.aldebaran.qimessaging.CallError,
                         java.lang.InterruptedException
Sets a parameter of the speech recognition engine. Note that when the ASR engine language is set to Chinese, no parameter can be set. The parameters that can be set and the corresponding values are: "Sensitivity" - Values : range is [0.0; 1.0]. "Timeout" - Values : default values 3000 ms. Timeout for the remote recognition "MinimumTrailingSilence" : Values : 0 (no) or 1 (yes) - Applies a High-Pass filter on the input signal - default value is 0.

Parameters:
paramName - Name of the parameter.
paramValue - Value of the parameter.
Throws:
com.aldebaran.qimessaging.CallError
java.lang.InterruptedException

setVocabulary

public void setVocabulary(java.util.List<java.lang.String> vocabulary,
                          java.lang.Boolean enabledWordSpotting)
                   throws com.aldebaran.qimessaging.CallError,
                          java.lang.InterruptedException
Sets the list of words (vocabulary) that should be recognized by the speech recognition engine.

Parameters:
vocabulary - List of words that should be recognized
enabledWordSpotting - If disabled, the engine expects to hear one of the specified words, nothing more, nothing less. If enabled, the specified words can be pronounced in the middle of a whole speech stream, the engine will try to spot them.
Throws:
com.aldebaran.qimessaging.CallError
java.lang.InterruptedException

addContext

public void addContext(java.lang.String pathToLCFFile,
                       java.lang.String contextName)
                throws com.aldebaran.qimessaging.CallError,
                       java.lang.InterruptedException
Add a context from a LCF file.

Parameters:
pathToLCFFile - Path to a LCF file. This LCF file contains the set of rules that should be recognized by the speech recognition engine.
contextName - Name of the context of your choice.
Throws:
com.aldebaran.qimessaging.CallError
java.lang.InterruptedException

wait

public java.lang.Boolean wait(java.lang.Integer id,
                              java.lang.Integer timeoutPeriod)
                       throws com.aldebaran.qimessaging.CallError,
                              java.lang.InterruptedException
Wait for the end of a long running method that was called using 'post'

Parameters:
id - The ID of the method that was returned when calling the method using 'post'
timeoutPeriod - The timeout period in ms. To wait indefinately, use a timeoutPeriod of zero.
Returns:
True if the timeout period terminated. False if the method returned.
Throws:
com.aldebaran.qimessaging.CallError
java.lang.InterruptedException

subscribe

public void subscribe(java.lang.String name,
                      java.lang.Integer period,
                      java.lang.Float precision)
               throws com.aldebaran.qimessaging.CallError,
                      java.lang.InterruptedException
Subscribes to the extractor. This causes the extractor to start writing information to memory using the keys described by getOutputNames(). These can be accessed in memory using ALMemory.getData("keyName"). In many cases you can avoid calling subscribe on the extractor by just calling ALMemory.subscribeToEvent() supplying a callback method. This will automatically subscribe to the extractor for you.

Parameters:
name - Name of the module which subscribes.
period - Refresh period (in milliseconds) if relevant.
precision - Precision of the extractor if relevant.
Throws:
com.aldebaran.qimessaging.CallError
java.lang.InterruptedException

subscribe

public void subscribe(java.lang.String name)
               throws com.aldebaran.qimessaging.CallError,
                      java.lang.InterruptedException
Subscribes to the extractor. This causes the extractor to start writing information to memory using the keys described by getOutputNames(). These can be accessed in memory using ALMemory.getData("keyName"). In many cases you can avoid calling subscribe on the extractor by just calling ALMemory.subscribeToEvent() supplying a callback method. This will automatically subscribe to the extractor for you.

Parameters:
name - Name of the module which subscribes.
Throws:
com.aldebaran.qimessaging.CallError
java.lang.InterruptedException
